# Attach packages and load data 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(hexbin)

ces <- read.csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
ces %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=white, y=ces_3_0_score))+
  geom_hex()+
  labs(x="% white population", 
       y="CalEnviroScreen 3.0 Score", caption= "Figure 1. describes the percentage of white population in a community vs its total CES 3.0 scores")+
  scale_fill_gradient(low="navy", high= "orange")+
  theme_minimal()
```
